derivation: a primitive root; to split or open, i.e. (literally, but only as denominative from H8179 (שַׁעַר)); compare see H7778 (שׁוֹעֵר)
outline:
1. to split open, reason out, calculate, reckon, estimate
    1. (Qal) to calculate Pr 23:7
strongs_def: to act as gatekeeper; (figuratively) to estimate
